original: Kusalo ajjhatto dhammo naajjhattassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ▁kusal o ▁ ajjhatt o ▁dhammo ▁na ajjhatt assa ▁na kusal assa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā nava, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
Kusalo bahiddhā dhammo nabahiddhā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ▁kusal o ▁bahiddhā ▁dhammo ▁na b a hi ddh ā ▁na kusal assa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
Kusalaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ▁kusalaṃ ▁ ajjhatt ārammaṇaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na kusal o ▁na ajjhatt ārammaṇ o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
Kusalaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ▁kusalaṃ ▁bahi ddh ārammaṇaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na kusal o ▁na b a hi ddh ārammaṇ o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
